title: Is ranked decay being kept on during preseason
body:
Everyone I see including myself seems to find themselves demoted even though they win more than 50% even up to 100% of their placement matches.

The only logical explanation i can think of as to why this is a thing is if ranked decay was left on during preseason when we were not able to play and access our true ranking, causing everyone over the several months to lose a few divisions. I see absolutely no reason as to why players would be getting demoted when they win more than half of their placements and get placed several divisions lower. It is not like it is a division or two and should be overlooked I have seen players including myself get dropped an entire league. Makes for some super hard climbing when it could possibly take a whole season to get out of a league simply due to bad luck, only to be dragged back down. I personally got dropped back in season 4 to 5, from silver 4 to bronze 4. I had never been below bronze 3 until the end of my placements which i won like 5/10. Based on how many leagues i have climbed i should be gold or plat but I and everyone else i have seen keeps getting dropped back heaps every start of season. I have yet to see someone end up above where they finished last season.

Please look into this.
